definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It ends with the words, "Was ever a thinker so travestied?"
sentences.chinese: 該書的最後說“有哪個思想家遭打如此歪曲？”

sentences.english: Every kind of Utopian conception is the responses of ideologist to the political reality.
sentences.chinese: 每一種烏托邦觀念都是思想家對當時政治現實的迴應。

sentences.english: Denis Diderot was one of the greatest philosophers and writers in the Age of Enlightenment in France.
sentences.chinese: 狄德羅是法國啓蒙時代偉大的思想家和作家。

sentences.english: Confucius was a great ideologist and educator in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 孔子是我國古代偉大的思想家和教育家。

sentences.english: 《Book of Changes》and the great thinkers of the pre-Qin period emphasize the ancient and contemporary significances.
sentences.chinese: 《周易》及先秦時代的重要思想家都注重古義和今義。

sentences.english: Garrett Eckbo was a designer, and a thinker also.
sentences.chinese: 埃克博是一位設計師，也是一位思想家。

sentences.english: I spend most of my time engaged with non-European thinkers.
sentences.chinese: 我的大部分時間都用來與非歐洲思想家打交道。

sentences.english: In the early 20th century, Irving Babbitt advocated New-Humanism.
sentences.chinese: 20世紀初，美國思想家白璧德提出了新人文主義。

sentences.english: On the bank the banker thanked the thinker for drinking ink.
sentences.chinese: 在堤上，銀行家感謝思想家喝墨水。

sentences.english: As we all know, Plotinus is one of the eminent philosophers during the transitional period between the ancient Greece and the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 普羅提諾是古希臘與中世紀之交的一位重要思想家。

sentences.english: The thing about true out-of-the-box thinkers is they d never use this cliche.
sentences.chinese: 真正的創新思想家是不會說出這句陳詞濫調的。

sentences.english: Rousseau was one of the greatest thinkers of the French Enlightment Movement in the 18th century.
sentences.chinese: 盧梭是十八世紀法國啓蒙運動中最偉大的思想家之一。

sentences.english: Aquarians are very friendly people, great conversationalists and thinkers.
sentences.chinese: 寶瓶座的人非常友好，是個口才絕佳的思想家。

sentences.english: Jiao Xun was a famous Confucian scholar and thinker in the Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 焦循是清代著名的經學家和思想家。

sentences.english: Dai Zhen was a famous thinker in the 18th of China.
sentences.chinese: 戴震是十八世紀中國傑出的思想家。

definition: scholar of the rationalist school of Neo-Confucianism 理學|理学[Li3 xue2]
jurist/member of the pre-Han legalist school
